pages.text: $(li)Turkey eggs can be thrown away right clicking while you are holding it in your hand.$(br)$(li)When the egg hits a block, this one has a little possibility of make a tiny $(l:patchouli:creatures/autumnity/turkey)Turkey$(/l) appears.
$(l) Turkey Eggs Food Recipes$() $(br)$(li)Pie$(li)Cake$(li)Tart$(li)Pancake$(li)Pudding$(li)Scrambled Egg$(li)Fried egg$(li)Aether-Glazed Cupcake
